news.title: Discord server
news.body: Welcome to the new and improved (?) Aerochat! We'll post news and other goodies here. For now, you can join our {hlink:Url="Discord server"} for updates!

videos.title: WE HAVE A PODCAST
videos.description: HEY FUCKFACE!! Wanna hear a loser talk about a niche messenger from 12 years ago? No? Well fuck you!

textads.text: FREE MY BOY RAINO HE AINT DO NUN WRONG
